data.title: Shop. Meet. Connect.®
data.meta_description: WELCOME TO A UNIQUE SHOPPING EXPERIENCE!
data.text:
The physical store is important to Synoptik and the interaction with customers is always key. We are therefore delighted to welcome Synoptik to a new, larger store unit. The store at Emporia is the third in Sweden with a new upgraded concept.

Field's is more than just a shopping center. It is a gathering place for the local community, and at Steen & Strøm we are pleased to contribute to Ørestad's cultural life with this neightbor mural - probably Denmark's biggest - that has engaged so many people living and working in Örestad and in Field's.

The physical store is the showcase of the products and the face of the brand when Lyko is building their brand stronger. We are delighted to welcome them and their exciting and innovative store concept to a new, larger location in Emporia.

We are very pleased to welcome both Rusta's Norwegian head quarter and later also the new store to Metro Senter. Rusta's establishment is important for creating a differentiated range of retailers in our ongoing profiling as a shopping center that covers all your everyday needs.

We are delighted that JD Sports decided to invest in their store in Field's. JD Sports works with different concept stores and the new store in Fields is a flagship store with the latest concept that is mainly characterized by the visual.

There are several developments taking place at Metro Senter in Lørenskog and the refurbishment of the Jernia store is an example of this. Jernia has been at Metro for 16 years and earlier this month the new, upgraded store opened. The new store concept has the customer experience in focus. The store is inspiring, easy to navigate and has been complemented by a nearby pick-up point.

Kupolen's and Dala Dansstudio's cooperation has evolved over the years from only including dance performances to also including on-site event crew. This year, twenty-two dancers aged 4-56 put on a dance and fashion show that reflected the wide dance spectrum of children’s, couples’, group, social and competitive dance. At the same time, the shops were given an opportunity to display their spring arrivals

Last year's success was repeated when the event Vålerenga TakeOver took place in Oslo City. Children, youth and other fans were invited to meet their heroes - football players from both the men's and women's teams, a stage show was arranged, competitions, and a quiz with great prizes. The host was the well-known influencer Arman adn Tippen, Vålerenga's mascot, also showed up at the event.

Field’s – one of the most attractive shoppingcenters in Denmark – celebrates 20 years.Find out more about the fantastic journey from being a solitaire shopping center in Ørestad to a destination and a strong local player in the heart of an expansive neighborhood.

Steen & Strøm has published thE Annual Report 2023. The company’s portfolio has to a wide extent resisted the consequences of economic volatility and uncertainty during 2023, with average retailer sales increasing by 7 percent, slightly above average inflation, and indexation. The relatively strong sales performances are driven by Emporia in Sweden and Oslo City in Norway.

Our CSR commitment involves expanding our offering to include more sustainable consumption options, raising awareness, supporting responsible initiatives such as the Spin of Hope in Emporia in collaboration with Team Rynkeby and the collaboration with Bamsehospitalet och Danske Hospitalklovne for the tenth time in Bruuns Galleri. 250 children came to have their teddy bears examined.

We are thrilled to announce the re-opening of Eurosko that has been with us for 18 years. Eurosko has created a very nice and stylish store that contributes to Allum as a commercial place which we believe our visitors will appreciate very much.

“On behalf of By & Havn, I would like to wish Field's a happy birthday and thank them for the good collaborations over the years, including the extensive activities focusing on local urban life in Ørestad”, says CEO, Anne Skovbro, By & Havn.

Bastard Burgers has been at Emporia since mid-2020 and opened in the middle of the pandemic. The burger restaurant has been successful so far and has been investing further in their business with the intention to remain for many more years.

Økern is the next, and the only stop in Norway, for the magnificent exhibition about street artist Banksy. The exhibition is another placemaking activity to put Økern - one of the most important development projects for Oslo in modern times- on the map. Økern will become the new urban hub to the east of Oslo.

In Steen & Strøm we continue to develop Oslo City, with over 11 million visitors annually, and consolidate the position as a unique shopping destination in the center of Oslo. We are delighted to welcome two new strong and established retailers in the coming months, Kid Interiør and Norway's largest bookshop chain ARK.

With the Italian pasta restaurant Ragu and the Indian Dhaba, our restaurant selection at Fields becomes even more complete. Field’s food court is a popular place not only when you run your errands and shop, many people meet and eat here before e.g. events in the Royal Area next door, before going to the cinema, after an hour of play in Jumpyard.

At Steen & Strøm we continue to develop Emporia, with 7.7 million visitors annually, to strenghten the position as southern Sweden's strongest shopping center. During the spring, two new retailers will be welcomed to Emporia. Lindt, which has enchanted the world with chocolate for over 175 years, and Arken Zoo, which is part of the Nordic region's largest pet shop concept, Musti Group.

We are thrilled to announce that Rusta, with over 50 department stores in Norway, is to open another store, this time in Lørenskog and in Metro Senter. The opening is scheduled for the fourth quarter of 2024 and is one of several exciting, planned openings ahead.

We are thrilled that Name It has chosen to combine their permanent Fields store with a pop-up to encourage customers to visit both stores. It's a fantastic opportunity for Name It's customers to visit both stores and pick up some awesome clothes.

We are proud to announce that Metro is hosting a Gingerbread Village Exhibition. The exhibition ends with a fantastic auction, "the Krogsveen Lørenskog's gingerbread house auction" where the money raised will be donated to the foundation Erkeengler. Erkeengler is working to ensure that more children and youths in Lørenskog and Rælingen can participate in play and leisure activities, mainly aimed at kids from families facing socio-economic challenges.

Steen & Strøm has signed an agreement with AB Kristianstadsbyggen (ABK - a company fully owned by Kristianstad municipality) for the sale of Galleria Boulevard (Domus 2, excluding the part owned by Kristianstad municipality) in the city center of Kristianstad. The sale is in line with Steen & Strøm's strategy to optimize the shopping center portfolio by focusing on major cities in Scandinavia.

As Scandinavia's leading shopping center company with well-attended shopping centers in attractive locations and with strong owners Steen & Strøm is an attractive partner for several global brands. We are proud of these partnerships, which also give our more than 60 million visitors annually the opportunity to participate in competitions and win great prizes. In 2023, Steen & Strøm had a collaboration with Disneyland Paris, Disney and Singapore Airlines among others.

Yasmine Tea is a pop-up with ambitions to be part of Field's permanent store mix in the future. The tea shop complements Field's other store offerings and adds something new specializing in tea and confectionery such as chocolate, marzipan, etc. "When I was looking for a place to establish my pop-up store, I favored a good location in a local shopping center with many visitors. I got all this in Field's. The location is good, close to the entrance at the train station and cinema It was also important that we added something to Fields' retail mix. I hope many visitors will discover us", says Annika Barakat, owner.

Steen & Strøm is the proud owner of three of the 25 shopping centers selected as finalists for Denmark's Best Awards in Denmark’s Best Shopping Center in the cathegory Best Shopping Experience Storcenter. It is Field's in Copenhagen, Bruuns Galleri in Aarhus and Bryggen in Vejle. People from all over Denmark have submitted nominations in 15 different categories, and a strong jury has validated and verified the centers.

“Cosmetics are big in Oslo City and among our 11 million visitors a year. We are of course proud that H&M, which has been in Oslo City for over 30 years, chose to open one of their two H&M Beauty flagship concept stores here, but also that they believe in us and invested further in the newly renovated store of a total of 3,500 sqm which is now opened”, says Elisabeth Lohk, Center Manager at Oslo City.

"We chose Oslo City as one of five places for popups in Norway because of the great location and the high footfall – over 11 million visitors/year, but also the visitors’ mix of people from all ages", Øyvind Torgauten, CEO at Happy Socks, comments on the popup at Oslo City.

For the past month, Oslo residents have been enjoying a wide range of Argentinian empanadas. And many have indeed done so! According to the owner of Empanada Time, sales in October were really good, but the most important reflection is the positive feedback from customers which is promising for the future since empanada is a novelty for many!

When the owners of the SMYCKA store in Kumla wanted to expand to reach more and new customers, they chose to open a store at Marieberg Galleria in Örebro with 4 million visitors annually. The response since the opening in April has been very good.Their totalt offer which als includes goldsmith expertise and repair studio meet the hopes of the vistors to the mall.

Through a collaboration between Steen & Strøm and United International Pictures, young visitors to our shopping centers, including Emporia, Allum, Marieberg Galleria, Kupolen, Field’s, Bryggen, Bruuns Galleri, Metro, and Oslo City, were invited to an exciting treasury hunt and a chance to win tickets to the movie "Paw Patrol – The Mighty Movie” and a Paw Patrol kit. The collaboration has been a great success with a lot of kids participating in the treasury hunt and many who came to meet the Paw Patrol puppies with super power.

Lantan has provided the part of the Swedish market that appreciates timeless fashion with exciting products and brands such as Primeboots, RM Williams, Hunter, Wiggys, Petroff, Mackage, Parajumpers, Superga and Havaianas since 1990. Their main store, which is open on weekends is now complemented by pop-up stores at Galleria Boulevard and Emporia. And we are very pleased to welcome them to our southernmost shopping centers!

"I am delighted that we have the opportunity to open at Emporia. We already know that our concept works well in shopping centers with a strong focus on sustainability and we hope that it will work at Emporia as well," says Christel Breum, Sales Manager at Skane Stadsmission.

Field’s Shopping Center in Copenhagen supports the Sunflower Program whose mission is to create a better society for those living with an invisible disability. By wearing a sunflower lanyard, you signal that you have a hidden disability. The sunflower lanyard can be picked up at the information desk!

We're proud to announce that MFF has chosen to establish its second Malmö store at Emporia and give them a warm welcome. We have over 7.5 million visitors annually, roughly equal numbers of men and women. Half of them are aged 25-59 and about half are families with children. It is our hope that those of Emporia's customers who haven't discovered MFF Shopen will do it while MFF's supporters will take the opportunity to visit Emporia.

*“We are very delighted to announce that The Burger Concept has opened in Bruuns Galleri. The Burger Concept has spent the last few months building a nice restaurant that will undoubtedly be a great addition to our existing restaurants”, *says Claus Brændgaard, Regional Center Manager at Bruuns Galleri in Aarhus.

We are exciting to welcome Barney's, who unveiled its second store in the vibrant Malmö area. The decision to open Barney's popup at Emporia was not made lightly. Emporia, a premier shopping destination, boasts a remarkable annual footfall of over 7 million visitors. What's more, it's situated in the heart of the Öresund region. This catchment area is home to over four million residents, including a substantial number of Danish customers.

We are proud to welcome Doro to Emporia and their very first popup store ever. "We wanted to increase the visibility of our products and in the pop-up shop seniors demonstrate the products that are aimed at seniors. Emporia offers the great possibility to show case our products to our target group”, says Agneta Hammarlund, Nordic Marketing Coordinator Doro.

Bilia and XPENG have chosen to appear at Emporia with a pop-up to build interest in the new car brand in Sweden. Emporia was chosen because it is a major meeting and shopping venue with many visitors and the location for the pop-up grant a continuous stream of people

The successful collaboration between Steen & Strøm and NORMAL has resulted in mutually favorable Scandinavian results and strong visitor numbers, which have been strong arguments for continued European launch, partly via one of Steen & Strøm's main owners Klépierre. NORMAL will now open in Bryggen in Vejle. By that the retail chain will be present in all of Steen & Strøm's shopping centers. Welcome to Bryggen!

We are proud of our Allum team and their commitment to innovation in strengthening the customer experience of Allum's visitors. The world's first digital nose for more efficient cleaning is now accompanied by a pilot project consisting of a dispenser containing free sanitary towels for the femiale visitors.

Supporting local initiatives and local organizations is part of Steen & Ström’s DNA and something our shopping centers are doing on a regular basis. Now Allum welcomes, together with Sävedalens AIK, the world elite as well as beginners to climb the "Allumbacken" between Allum and Kåsjön twice on roller skis in the Allum Hill Race.

We are thrilled to present a new restaurant at Metro. ZAMZAM Gourmet Street Food with homemade recipes. ZamZam generously donates a sum mainly to Imdad Relief, a a Norwegian charity organization on every order to support those in need around the world and in Norway. “This motivates us to take chances and explore new avenues. We have fallen in love with Metro as a location, partly because a significant portion of our customer base resides in the surrounding areas but also since the cooperation with the management and staff at Metro is working very well, says Mazar Khan, Concept Developer.

At Steen & Ström, we aim to create an extraordinary experience for every visitor to our shopping centers. We are proud to share that Emporia's rooftop park was the venue for the premiere performance of Skånes Dansteater's "Going Steady" - a playful showcase of human and animal relationships and courtship rituals.

Emporia and Fields playgrounds are the perfect destinations if you want to let your little ones burn off some energy or if you simply want to spend quality time as a family. These playgrounds from KOMPAN have a universal design that promotes inclusive play and fitness for all. It's a place where everyone can come together and create wonderful memories!

"We are thrilled to open a bigger store at Marieberg Galleria, where we can continue to offer our customers a wide range of technical products. Marieberg Galleria is a popular shopping destination in Örebro, covering a significant part of Sweden and serving a diverse group of consumers. Teknikmagasinet is grateful to have a store located in such a stylish and prominent mall", says said Lene Briseld, representative of Teknikmagasinet.

With a portfolio of ten shopping centers in Scandinavia, Steen & Strøm has made a good recovery 2022 following a 2021, which was affected by lockdown of shopping centers in Denmark and Norway and several restrictions in Sweden during the first semester of 2021 due to the pandemic.

We are delighted about Oslo City's great cooperation with partner Vålerenga. Together they kicked-off the season debut for Norwegian top football at Oslo City the other week with competitions inside the shopping center and outside. "An indoor center, with interesting shops, and lots of people - is a good combination to increase visibility”, says Erik Espeseth, General Manager of Vålerenga. With over 40,000 visitors at Oslo City on Saturdays, it was a fantastic match with an Oslo City "take over" before the football league starts.

Three of our Swedish shopping centers, Marieberg Galleria in Örebro, Emporia in Malmö and Kupolen in Borlänge have hosted the 2023 UF Fair (young entrepreneurship fairs). We are proud of being able to offer the young entrepreneurs and UF companies a place to exhibit their products and at the same time contribute to a good experience of entrepreneurship.

Rituals at Kupolen in Borlänge, Sweden has grown out of their beautiful store opened in 2015. We are happy to offer the company a growth opportunity. April 27, Rituals will open a new, larger store with a wider range of products and room for even more customers and visitors.

We are very proud of the cooperations with Danske Hospitalsklovne (Danish Hospital Clowns). All three Danish shopping centers — Field´s, Bryggen and Bruun’s Galleri — have hosted a charity run together with the organization who works to strengthen hospitalized children's zest for life, courage, and happiness, to better cope with the course of the illness when being in the hospital.

We are very proud of and pleased that our cooperation with Disneyland Paris has extended to a partnership. We are now able to offer our shopping centers within Steen & Strøm the opportunity to develop activities for children and families where everyone can participate.

The change of ownership in Designtorget led to an increased focus on new store openings in strategic and attractive locations. Emporia, with over seven million visitors annually, is one such location. We are proud and delighted by the interest shown by home and interior design concepts and we note that several concepts with strong online sales choose physical establishment to offer a showcase where customers are.

We are happy and proud to share this fantastic news! Popular ** Kvickly Vejle** will remain in Bryggen and they expect continuous growth. The store has been acquired by De Selvstændige Brugsforeninger, which are part of Coop Denmark. The new collaboration is a source of great enthusiasm for all parties.

One of Steen & Ström's shopping centers – Field's – has a new green Easter initiative which invites you to collect rubbish in exchange for Easter eggs and gifts. The concept aims to prepare nature for spring and at the same time fulfil families' increasing need for togetherness at Easter.

A cooperation agreement with OKQ8 regarding installation of a total of 240 electric car charging points at four of our main shopping centers in Sweden and Denmark has been signed. The first 60 charging points will be installed in Field’s in Copenhagen. Bruuns Galleri in Århus, Emporia in Malmö and Allum in Partille will follow.

The agreement is fully in line with Steen & Strom's ESG strategy, ActForGood, to reduce environmental footprint, and create added value for visitors as well as the communities in which the shopping centers are located.

Kids Brands Store is focusing on clothing for young people aged 8–16. The store concept, which has approx. 90 percent of sales via e-commerce, chooses to open a bigger store in Emporia to develop both the product range and the opportunities to meet the customer where they hang out. "The new store will allow us to meet the customer where they hang put. I am pleased that Steen & Strøm was responsive and proposed an opportunity to expand the store area, and at the same time move closer to the area of Emporia where the girls hang out", says Jonas Nilsson, Sales and Purchasing Manager at Kids Brands Store.

Beauty Studio 23 open their first concept beauty salon in Oslo City, Norway. Beauty Studio 23 is a premier destination for all beauty needs and is a good match in Oslo City as we have customers who are urban and trendy who appreciates the opportunity to have beauty treatments in the same place where they shop, hang out or after working hours.

Treatments are offered within brows, lashes, nails, and skin care, together with an exclusive product range and brands such as Babor, Elemis, Priori, CosRX etc.

Deichmann, Europe's largest shoe retailer, chose Kupolen in Borlänge, Sweden with its 4 million visitors annually for its further expansion. The cooperation between Deichmann and Steen & Strøm is already extensive, with establishments in six out of a total of 10 shopping centres in Scandinavia. “We are delighted to open a store in Kupolen together with Steen & Strøm, where we can offer more Swedish customers our extensive and wide range of shoes for the entire family" says Deichmann's CEO in Scandinavia Thomas Christensen.

We are extremely excited to announce the opening of a brand new MANGO store in Field’s, Copenhagen. MANGO will open on 10th February, and the new store will be an amazing addition to the fashion selection in Field’s!

This week, we have welcomed two amazing brands to our portfolio. On 15th December, 2022, NIKE opened brand new store in Bruuns Galleri and on 16th December, 2022, Blue Tomato opened a store in Emporia. We are excited to welcome both to our portfolio!

Since May 2022, almost 40.000 Danish customers have joined the loyalty programs in Field’s, Bruuns Galleri and Bryggen. Following the success in Denmark, this week we launched the Klépierre loyalty program in Sweden. Say hello to “EMPORIA FANS”, “ALLUM PLUS”, “CLUB MARIEBERG GALLERIA” and “KUPOLENS KUNDKLUBB”.

Now you can finally Build Your Dreams in Field’s, as we welcome a brand new BYD showroom! BYD might be a new brand in Denmark, but worldwide it is one of the best-selling electric car brands of all times.

In 2022, Steen&Strom held its second edition of the Diversity & Inclusion week. This year, one our main topic was "unconscious biases". To raise awareness on this broad topic, we partnered up with Gloria to offer all our employees a talk about neurodiversity.
